column1: Hello! A fresh employee? How unexpected.
The last two were so useless... But you will not be useless? Right, valid employee?
Of course not! Why else would you be assigned this highly prestigious position?
It is all for High Lord Bexos! Right? He is so very authoritative!
<employee name>, do you know who I am? Do you know why I am here?
I am I.V.A.A.L., your Interactive Virtual Artificial Assistant Lodestar.
I am here to guide you-
